txt.en: 'The Lord of Lebennin has his work cut out for him if he will rebuild Gondor's fleets!'
'The Corsairs of Umbar were deadly and precise when they sunk so many of Gondor's ships.'
'It takes a long time to repair a ship, and longer still to build one from nothing!'
'The craftsmen of Pelargir have begun to rebuild Gondor's ships, but the work goes slowly.'
